page.title: 16Clubs (sheet 2)
page.content: At the Whitehill Club they play darts, pool, snooker and table tennis in-doors. They play Cricket and lawn bowls out-side. There is a newly made bowling green with 4 rinks beside the cricket pitch. We have a pub which is not very popular.Most people have a drink at the Whitehill Club. Unlike other places we do not have a park.There are two children's play areas, with swings and see-saws. The Golf Club which is the other side of the village is about six square miles in area. There are eighteen holes on the golf course, which is the normal. It is good enough to be a championship course. The village hall is used for evening recreation for the community. By David Gibson.
